content: Now I face out, I hold out, I reach out to the truth of my life seeking to seize on the whole moment. Yeah, naked truth lies only if you realize, appearing in nobody's eyes till they sterilize. Stop the guerrilla warfare to keep it fair, bro, change your rage to a smarter greater cause, you know the stake is high stardom is near. Those who sympathized, you die killers pass by. Do not waste your time in hating flirting guys. Use your might to AIs do justice to them all.
author: Persona 4
source: Reach Out Out To The Truth
